content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier. Moving in a clockwise direction from the Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier, the elements on the path are a fiddler crab, a cheeseburger, a chime, a magpie, a fountain pen, a loupe, a confectionery store, a fountain, and a hummingbird. Starting from the Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier, you move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 3 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

The Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier is at the top of the path, and you start from there. You move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, which takes you to the fiddler crab. Then, you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, which takes you to the cheeseburger. Finally, you move around the ring by 3 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, which takes you back to the Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier. Therefore, you will find the Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier again after these three movements.

Finally, you move around the ring by 3 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, which takes you back to the cheeseburger. Therefore, after these five movements, you will find the cheeseburger again.
